projects.title: Portfolio
projects.details: As my first solo project, I created a portfolio website to display some information about me, a link to view and download my CV, all the ways of contacting me aswell as some info about my projects. </br>This website is easily updated as I created json data that holds all of my projects in it and used JS to fetch that data and show it on my projects page. This way I can easily add new projects to my page. This is my first time bulding something without any templates or designs provided.

projects.title: BookSwap Frontend
projects.details: Communal bookshelf web platform built in a dev team of 5. This project was built using React for the frontend while seamlessly integrating with a prebuilt backend API. The platform offers features such as book claims, returns, reviews, and inventory management. We utilized Git for efficient version control and agile methodologies to guide our development process. Each feature or 'user story' was meticulously reviewed by peers and then by our trainer, ensuring both quality and alignment with the project's goals.

projects.title: BookSwap API
projects.details: Backend RESTful API built in a dev team of 5. We used a TDD approach for this project, using PHPUnit to write integration tests. We were given documentation that we had to make sure out API matched so that it would work correctly with the front-end we had now built.
projects.techstack: PHP, Laravel, MySQL, git, Postman, agile
